greeting: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there! What can I assist you with?
hours: We are open 24/7 to support our global clients.
services: We offer inbound and outbound call center services, live chat support, email handling, and virtual assistant solutions.
location: Our office is based in Manila, Philippines.
languages: Our agents are fluent in English, Filipino, and some also speak Spanish and French.
pricing: Pricing varies depending on the services required. Please contact our sales team for a custom quote.
support: Of course! I'm here to help. Could you tell me more about your issue?
agent: Sure, connecting you to a live agent now...
